src:
Budite neustrašivi uz najnovije Air Jordan 1 High OG Fearless patike [FOTO]
06 Nov 2019, 16:33 by Milos
Brend NIKE odlučio je da obraduje svoje verne obožavaoce i tokom ove praznične sezone predstavi najnoviji model „Fearless Ones“ patika –Air Jordan 1 High OG Fearless. Od 9. novembra, svi ljubitelji Air Jordan brendau Srbiji biće u prilici da postanu vlasnici ovih „neustrašivih“ patika.
Kolekciju „Fearless Ones“ odlikuje simbolični Air Jordan 1 narativ, koji unikatnim dizajnom svojih modelainspiriše ljubitelje patika iobjašnjava šta znači biti neustrašiv. Ono što izdvaja ovaj model od ostalih jeste novi dizajn koji je inspirisan pričom o košarkaškoj karijeri jednog od najboljih igrača u istoriji košarke – Majkla Džordana. Mešavina „University Blue“ i „Gym Red“ boja simbolično predstavlja početke ove košarkaške legende i poručuje svim sanjarima da ne odustaju od svojih ciljeva. Pored specifičnih boja, patiku karakterišu i poznata „Džordan krila“, koja su zadržala originalnu zlatno-crnu kombinaciju boja Fearless Ones patika. Krajem godine očekuje nas još jedan model – Air Jordan 1 mid SE Fearless Maison Chateau, čiji je dizajn inpirisan afričkim kontinentom, a odlikuju ga svetloplava i žuta boja.



Ovaj limitirani model stiže 9. novembra u Srbiju i biće ekskluzivno dostupan u TIKE Shop – u, Kralja Petra 24. Međutim, oni koji žele da postanu vlasnici Air Jordan 1 High OG Fearless patika moraće, pored želje za kupovinom, da imaju i malo sreće. Naime, ove patike prodavaće se po principu lutrije, gde svi zainteresovani mogu uzeti svoj jedinstveni broji tokom izvlačenja dobiti priliku da budu jedni od retkih koji će ovaj inovativni model „prošetati“ ulicama Beograda.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Be fearless with the latest Air Jordan 1 High OG Fearless sneakers [PHOTO]
06 Nov 2019, 15:33 by Milos
The NIKE brand has decided to cheer on its loyal fans and during this festive season presents the latest model "Fearless Ones" sneakers - Air Jordan 1 High OG Fearless. From November 9, all fans of Air Jordan brand in Serbia will have the opportunity to become owners of these "fearless" sneakers.
The Fearless Ones Collection features the iconic Air Jordan 1 narrative, which inspires sneaker lovers with the unique design of its models and explains what it means to be fearless. What sets this model apart from the others is a new design inspired by the story of the basketball career of one of the best players in basketball history - Michael Jordan. The mixture of "University Blue" and "Gym Red" colors symbolically represents the beginnings of this basketball legend and tells all dreamers not to give up on their goals. In addition to the specific colors, the sneaker is also characterized by the famous Jordan Wings, which retained the original gold-black color combination of Fearless Ones sneakers. At the end of the year, we have another model - the Air Jordan 1 mid SE Fearless Maison Chateau, whose design is inspired by the African continent and is distinguished by its light blue and yellow colors.



This limited edition arrives in Serbia on November 9th and will be exclusively available at TIKE Shop, King Peter 24. However, those wishing to become owners of the Air Jordan 1 High OG Fearless sneaker will have to have a little luck in addition to their purchase wish. . Namely, these sneakers will be sold on the lottery principle, where all interested can take their unique numbers during the draw and get the opportunity to be one of the few that will walk this innovative model on the streets of Belgrade.
